item.title: List of software on My Workstation
item.description: My Workstation Operating System: Debian GNU/Linux 12 (bookworm) Kernel: 6.1.0-10-amd64 Hostname: Mothership Package Manager: apt Init System: systemd Display Manager: Xorg Network Manager: Networkd Firewall: Firewalld Boot Manager: Grub (NOT BOOTD) Firewall Config: No open ports Power settings: Powertop Desktop Enviroment: Gnome 43.4 Gnome Extensions: Bitcoin Markets, Dash to Dock, Mullvad Indicator and User Themes User Themes: Colloid-Dracula-Dark Grub Theme: Dracula GTK 3/4 Theme: Gradience (Custom Theme) Bitcoin Markets Indicators: BTC, LTC and DOGE
